summary: This is facial expression bat file.
descriptionHtml:
[b][b][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#f1c232][size=4][b]About[/b][/size][/color][/font][/b][/b]
This MOD is bat file only.
I will share facial expression bat file my made for myself. :D

Add 44 types.
("f0" and "z0" is for reset.)

Add bat file of facial expression setting.
Please input from the console.
If you do not understand how to use the "bat file" and "console command" please search yourself.
[size=2]>> [/size][url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Console_Commands_(Skyrim)][size=2]Skyrim Console Commands List[/size][/url]

*[u]Depending on the environment and modeling, there may be cases where the facial expression looks not like the image. Please note.[/u]

[b][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#f1c232][size=4][b]Requirement[/b][/size][/color][/font][/b]
Skyrim
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/44596]Mfg Console[/url] - by. [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1024728]kapaer[/url]

[b][b][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#f1c232][size=4][b]Recommended[/b][/size][/color][/font][/b][/b][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1024728]
[/url][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35303]Female Facial Animation[/url] - by. [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/641048]nao4288[/url]

[b][b][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#f1c232][size=4][b][size=4][size=4]Install[/size][/size][/b][/size][/color][/font][/b][/b]
Copy the files is your Skyrim folder.

[b][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#f1c232][size=4][b][size=4]Treatment[/size][/b][/size][/color][/font][/b]
1. Open the console.
2. Click on your character or NPC.
3. Enter "bat XX". ( XX is bat file name. )
4. Apply.

*[u]For facial expressions made for tongue use, you should use Tongue MOD.
[/u]
[youtube]9sR5YsQsTtc[/youtube]
[font=Arial][size=2]The user provided a video of how to use. Thank you so much![/size][/font]

[b][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#f1c232][size=4][b][size=4]Credits in Screenshot
[/size][/b][/size][/color][/font][/b][url=https://www.loverslab.com/files/file/1450-equipable-tongues-retexture/]Equipable tongues Retexture 0.1[/url] - by. xuniana
[url=https://kimiepanda.tumblr.com/post/171635152565/km-bikini-uunp-add-4-bikinis-sandals]KM Bikini[/url] - by. Panda girl
